main event: Two objects the size of planet Venus were sighted, one larger than the other, moving in an inverted V-shape and leaving a glowing trail.
interesting points: Witness reported significant differences in altitude, size, and speed of the objects., The sighting lasted for approximately 3.5 minutes., Objects were observed at a course of 320Â°., Witness was a 23-year-old salesman familiar with jet aircraft., The event occurred in daylight.
